Text: RE Whats upPST Doing alright Kendal is working downtown for a Management Consulting firm Im still working for the same marketing where I am head of the IT division We bought a house in Memorial last year and are still in the process of renovating it It didnt need a lot but we are taking our time getting the way we want it When I say we I mean Kendal I learned that my opinion didnt matter after a few weeks of buying the place I saw Dave Peterson a while back We talked about having a Sammy get together this spring Maybe a long weekend at Padre or Cancun I get great Travel benefits and can get condos at resorts for wk I might also be able to get enough free airline tickets to take care of you and Howard the three musketeers Let me know if you would be interested Let me know you have some free time after the holidays and we can hook up Brian A Horn MCSE Manager of Technical Operations Trilegiant Houston Office Fax Cell Original Message From mailto Sent Monday December PM To Horn Brian A Subject RE Whats up Hey Bro My wife worked here also and has been let go I work for the Natural Gas Trading group that they are trying to sell Should know by the end of the week about my job I was just talking to Kevin Crawford about you weeks ago when we were in Vegas Good to know that you are still out there How are you doing these days Dutch Original Message From Horn Brian A ENRON Sent Monday December PM To Dutch Quigley Subject Whats up I thought about you when I heard about Enron Were you affected Give me a call and we can meet up sometime Brian A Horn MCSE Manager of Technical Operations Trilegiant Houston Office Fax Cell This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
